New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the second player to score back-to-back hundreds in T20Is
Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw scored 109 runs from 56 balls
Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw put on 163 runs, the highest partnership in the history of the T20 World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: It was good to watch, knowing Rilee (Rossouw), he has done it for quite a while now. It is good to have him back in our side. He walked in and gave us some impetus, it was a treat to watch
Rilee Rossouw also became the second player to score back-to-back hundreds in T20Is
